Ref: When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the transit gateway multicast domain ID. For example: tgw-mcast-domain-000fb24d04EXAMPLE.

GetAtt.Description: The time the multicast domain was created.
The state of the multicast domain.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the multicast domain.
The ID of the multicast domain.
